name: Desolate Sands
description: Desolate Sands is an Adventure Puzzle Game.You will be taken back centuries in 1940’s where your plane crashes next to a tomb. The tomb holds untold secrets, and you will soon find yourself journeying into its depths of horrors. Gamers will have the opportunity to face rooms full of challenging puzzles and only those who can solve them will be able to progress deeper.
